record.id: field.name="expectedResolution" and file.name="incidents" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: expectedResolution
record.file.name: incidents

brief.brief: The date/time when the Interaction is expected to be resolved.

detail.detail: If the SLA module is enabled, the Expected Resolution is auto-populated by the system when the Interaction is created. The earliest expiration time from all Response SLOs for the Interaction which have a Final State that matches the last state as defined in the Response Progression State sequence is used to populate this field.
